results.definition: the act of colonizing; the establishment of colonies
a community of people smaller than a town
termination of a business operation by using its assets to discharge its liabilities
a body of people who settle far from home but maintain ties with their homeland; inhabitants remain nationals of their home state but are not literally under the home state's system of government
something settled or resolved; the outcome of decision making
examples: they finally reached a settlement with the union

results.definition: a conclusive resolution of a matter and disposition of it
an area where a group of families live together
